welcomeMessage.message: This extension helps you align chatGPT to right-to-left languages.

whatsNewMessage.message: Thank you for using Rtlify ChatGPT. Here you can find the improvements and new features in the latest version

feature1.message: Added a button to change text direction in the chat box
feature1.description: Added a button to change text direction in the chat box

feature2.message: Display mathematical text direction from left to right in all modes for easy reading
feature2.description: Display mathematical text direction from left to right in all modes for easy reading

feature3.message: Align text direction in the chat box according to the first letter in the conversation
feature3.description: Align text direction in the chat box according to the first letter in the conversation

feature3Comment.message: This feature will be temporarily disabled after clicking the Text Alignment button and will be reactivated each time a new conversation is started
feature3Comment.description: This feature will be temporarily disabled after clicking the Text Alignment button and will be reactivated each time a new conversation is started

feature4.message: Saving a user preference for repeated use
feature4.description: Saving a user preference for repeated use

improvement1.message: Pin the text direction button at the top of the chat menu

comingSoonMessage.message: Here you will find new updates and features in the next version of ChatGPT.

comingSoonFeature1.message: Improving the display of mathematical text more accurately
comingSoonFeature1.description: Improving the display of mathematical text more accurately

feedbackMessage.message: We would love to hear your feedback!
